overview: Vincent Obermeier is an eleven-year veteran of online advertising.  He began his career in sales working as a national sales rep for companies such as Coolsavings.com, DoubleClick, and Max Worldwide.  In 2005 Vincent was hired at Tremor Media as employee number one and minority co-founder.  Charged with building an online ad network specifically for brand marketers, Vincent managed the development, deployment and growth of Tremor’s proprietary rich media and in-stream video technology and publisher base into the largest video ad network as ranked by Comscore.  In December of 2010 Vincent left Tremor Media and provided consulting services to several companies before launching TreSensa in July.  Vincent holds a BA from Union College.
